hero.title: Discover {gradient} Mac Apps
hero.description: A curated collection of the best Mac applications and tools for developers and designers. Find open source, free, and premium apps organized by category.

featured.title: Featured Open Source Apps
featured.subtitle: Free and open source applications loved by the community

contribute.title: Contribute to Awesome Mac
contribute.description: Know a great Mac app that should be on this list? The awesome-mac project is open source and welcomes contributions from the community.

categories.title: Categories
categories.subtitle: Browse apps by category and subcategory.

apps.title: Apps
apps.noApps: No apps match the current filters.

category.noApps: No apps found in this category.

meta.title: {appNames} Comparison
meta.description: Compare {appNames} side by side. Find the best app for your needs.
meta.notFoundDescription: One or more apps could not be found.

hero.description: See how these apps stack up against each other.

invalid.title: Invalid Comparison
invalid.description: You can compare between 2 to 4 apps at a time.

compare.pageDescription: Compare {appNames} to find the best app for your needs.

meta.title: Best {category} Apps for Mac
meta.description: Discover the best {category} apps for Mac. Hand-picked recommendations for maximum productivity.

best.title: Best {category} Apps

hero.description: Hand-picked apps that deliver exceptional experience and value.

best.noApps: No apps found in this category.

content.guideTitle: How to Choose the Right {category} App
content.intro: Choosing the right {category} app for your Mac can be overwhelming with so many options available. This guide helps you find the perfect tool for your needs.

whatToLookFor.title: What to Look For
whatToLookFor.nativeExperience: Native macOS experience with proper keyboard shortcuts and gestures
whatToLookFor.regularUpdates: Regular updates with bug fixes and new features
whatToLookFor.userReviews: Positive user reviews and active community support
whatToLookFor.freeTrials: Free trials or demo versions to test before buying
whatToLookFor.privacy: Strong privacy policy and data protection practices

freeVsPaid.title: Free vs Paid Options
freeVsPaid.description: While paid {category} apps often offer more features and support, free alternatives can be surprisingly capable. Consider your budget and how frequently you'll use the software.

meta.title: Free Alternatives to {appName} for Mac
meta.description: Discover free and open source alternatives to {appName} for Mac. Save money while still getting powerful features.
meta.alreadyFreeDescription: {appName} is already a free application. Check out other free alternatives below.

freeAlternatives.pageDescription: Find free and open source alternatives to {appName} for your Mac.

hero.paidApp: Discover free alternatives that can replace {appName} without breaking the bank.
hero.alreadyFree: This app is already free! Here are some other free alternatives you might like.

freeAlternatives.noAlternatives: No free alternatives found for this app.

content.intro: While {appName} may be a popular choice, there are many free alternatives available that can provide similar functionality without the cost. These options are perfect for budget-conscious users or those who prefer open source software.

benefits.noFees: No subscription fees or one-time payments
benefits.transparency: Open source code allows for transparency and security audits
benefits.communitySupport: Active community support and regular updates
benefits.noLockIn: No vendor lock-in or proprietary formats
benefits.regularUpdates: Frequent updates and feature additions from the community

content.howToChooseTitle: How to Choose the Right Alternative
content.howToChoose: When selecting a free alternative to {appName}, consider factors like ease of use, feature parity, community activity, and documentation quality. Many free alternatives offer unique features that may better suit your specific needs.

favorites.title: My Favorites
favorites.description: View and manage your favorite Mac apps

meta.title: Free Mac Apps
meta.description: Discover the best free Mac applications and tools. No cost, high quality software for your productivity.

hero.description: {count} free Mac applications available for download. These apps cost nothing but deliver powerful features.
hero.note: All apps listed here are completely free to use. Some may offer paid upgrades for additional features.

content.intro: Free Mac applications offer incredible value without the upfront cost. Many of these apps are developed by passionate communities or offer free tiers of premium software.

benefits.noCost: No upfront purchase or subscription fees
benefits.tryBeforeBuy: Test premium features through free trials
benefits.opensource: Open source options for transparency and customization
benefits.community: Active community support and regular updates
benefits.lowCommitment: No financial risk when trying new software

meta.title: Open Source Mac Apps
meta.description: Discover the best open source Mac applications. Free, transparent, and community-driven software for your Mac.

hero.description: {count} open source Mac applications available for download. These apps are free, transparent, and community-driven.
hero.note: All apps listed here are open source software with publicly available code.

content.whyTitle: Why Choose Open Source Mac Apps?
content.intro: Open source applications provide transparency, security, and the freedom to modify software. These projects are maintained by passionate communities worldwide.

benefits.transparency: Source code is publicly available for audit
benefits.security: Community-driven security audits and rapid bug fixes
benefits.noLockIn: No vendor lock-in - you control your data
benefits.communityDriven: Feature development driven by user needs
benefits.costEffective: Free to use with enterprise-grade features
benefits.longTerm: Software longevity independent from any single company

content.licenses: Most apps listed here use permissive licenses like MIT, Apache, or GPL, allowing you to use, study, modify, and distribute the software freely.
